                                                                   java.lang.String[] arguments)
                                                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        preparedStatement way of talking with the database (UNTESTED)
        Parameters:
        statement - SQL Query with ?
        arguments - String array with arguments in order to their places in the statement
        Returns:
        resultSet the answer from database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - which can be handled with helper.SqlHelper.class#printSQLException(SQLException e)
